TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供多级开关，用于控制跟踪和调试输出，而无需重新编译代码。

span.span: Provides a multilevel switch to control tracing and debug output without recompiling your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用跟踪开关，根据消息的重要性来筛选消息。You can use a trace switch to filter out messages based on their importance. 类提供 、、和 属性来测试交换机的级别。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the level of the switch. 属性获取或设置开关的 。The property gets or sets the switch's . 可以通过应用程序配置文件设置 的级别，然后在应用程序中使用配置的 级别。You can set the level of a through the application configuration file and then use the configured level in your application. 或者，您可以在代码中创建 ，并直接设置级别来检测代码的特定部分。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the level directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要配置 ，请为你的应用程序编辑配置文件。To configure a , edit the configuration file for your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除开关、设置开关的值，或者清除以前由应用程序设置的所有开关。In this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 此配置节定义将 设置为 `mySwitch`的 ，并将 设置为1，这对应于枚举值 。This configuration section defines a with the set to `mySwitch`, and the set to 1, which corresponds to the enumeration value . > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true` ，或表示枚举值的文本，例如 的 `Error`。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在应用程序中，可以通过创建一个具有相同名称的 来使用已配置的交换机级别，如以下示例中所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 默认情况下，将使用配置文件中指定的值设置开关 属性。By default, the switch property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 如果 构造函数在配置文件中找不到初始开关设置，则新开关的 默认为 。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the of the new switch defaults to . 您必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 以下语法是编译器特定的。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用C#或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器，请参阅编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在中C#启用调试，请在编译代码时将 `/d:DEBUG` 标志添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define DEBUG` 添加到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:DEBUG=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用跟踪C#，请在编译代码时将 `/d:TRACE` 标志添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define TRACE` 添加到文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:TRACE=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 当单独使用 类时，不需要这些调试和跟踪编译器开关。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 它们仅与有条件编译 或 方法一起需要。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 有关检测应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 有关配置和使用跟踪开关的详细信息，请参阅[跟踪开关](/dotnet/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](/dotnet/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches). > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以在类中使 成员 `static`。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ，并使用开关来确定是否要打印错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. 如果 属性设置为 或更高版本，则 `MyMethod` 写入第一条错误消息。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，如果 小于 ，`MyMethod` 不会写入第二个错误消息。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置 的级别，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加开关并设置其值、删除开关或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有开关。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true` ，或表示枚举值的文本，例如 的 `Error`。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在应用程序中，可以通过创建一个具有相同名称的 来使用已配置的交换机级别，如以下示例中所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 如果 构造函数在配置文件中找不到初始交换机设置，则新交换机的 属性将设置为 ""。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 类提供 、、和 属性来测试交换机的 。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the of the switch. 属性获取或设置开关的 。The property gets or sets the switch's . > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以在类中使 成员 `static`。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ，并使用开关来确定是否要打印错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. 如果 属性设置为 或更高版本，则 `MyMethod` 写入第一条错误消息。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，如果 小于 ，`MyMethod` 不会写入第二个错误消息。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName` 参数用于设置 属性的值，`description` 参数用于设置 属性的值，`defaultSwitchValue` 参数保存为字段并用于初始化第一次引用上的 属性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property, and the `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅 构造函数。See the constructor for more information and a code example.

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪级别，它将确定开关所允许的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace level that determines the messages the switch allows.

value.span: 指定开关所允许的消息级别的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the level of messages that are allowed by the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置 的级别，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加开关并设置其值、删除开关或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有开关。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true` ，或表示枚举值的文本，例如 的 `Error`。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 如果 构造函数在配置文件中找不到初始交换机设置，则新交换机的 属性将设置为 ""。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 设置此属性将更新 、、和 属性以反映新的值。Setting this property updates the , , , and properties to reflect the new value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ，并使用开关来确定是否要打印错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. 如果 属性设置为 或更高版本，则 `MyMethod` 写入第一条错误消息。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，如果 小于 ，`MyMethod` 不会写入第二个错误消息。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is set to a value that is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 更新并更正此开关的级别。

span.span: Updates and corrects the level for this switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET framework 使用 方法来验证和更正通过配置文件初始化的开关的值。The method is used by the .NET framework to validate and correct the value of a switch initialized via a configuration file. 如果在配置文件中指定的开关值不是由 枚举定义的，并且开关设置为定义的值，则会将消息写入所有跟踪侦听器。A message is written to all trace listeners if the switch value specified in the configuration file is not defined by the enumeration and the switch is set to a defined value. 如果你在代码中尝试将 属性设置为未由 枚举定义的值，则会引发 异常。If you attempt in your code to set the property to a value that is not defined by the enumeration, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 将 属性设置为 属性的整数等效值。

span.span: Sets the property to the integer equivalent of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当开关的 属性更改时，会在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally when the property of the switch changes. 方法可确保与开关的值相关的属性反映新的值。The method ensures that the properties relating to the switch's value reflect the new value.

para.span: 若要重写此属性，请将 属性的字符串值转换为 binary，然后设置 属性。

span.span: To override this property, convert the string value of the property to binary, and then set the property.

public: property bool TraceError { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，它指示开关是否允许错误处理消息。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the switch allows error-handling messages.

value.span: 如果 设置为 、、 或 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is set to , , , or ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将 、、和 属性与 和 类结合使用，以发出指定重要性或更高的所有消息。You can use the , , , and properties in conjunction with the and classes to emit all messages with a specified importance or greater. 如果 属性设置为最高重要性，，则仅发出错误处理消息。When the property is set to the highest importance, , , only error-handling messages are emitted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ，并使用开关来确定是否发出错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to emit error messages. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. 如果 属性设置为 或更高版本，则 `MyMethod` 写入第一条错误消息。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，如果 小于 ，`MyMethod` 不会写入第二个错误消息。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than .
